articles.title: Trump pushes Republicans to have rich pay more taxes - The Hill
articles.description: The White House is making a last-ditch push to raise taxes on the wealthiest Americans as part of President Trump’s “big beautiful bill,” as Republican lawmakers craft the final details of the tax package. The proposal, according to three sources, would allow…
